医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究找到逆转内耳细胞基因沉默的方法失聪的成年人无法恢复听力，因为内耳的感觉听觉细胞在受损后无法再生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-finds-way-to-reverse-gene-silencing-in-inner-ear-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-finds-way-to-reverse-gene-silencing-in-inner-ear-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=156bbcc4-674a-4f36-bbfe-9a4b72a9e548 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 22:04:36 -0400 Study finds way to reverse gene silencing in inner ear cells
干细胞用于制造分泌牙釉质蛋白的类器官现在，干细胞已经制造出了类器官，可以分泌形成牙釉质的蛋白质，牙釉质是保护牙齿免受损伤和腐烂的物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Stem-cells-used-to-create-organoids-that-secret-dental-enamel- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Stem-cells-used-to-create-organoids-that-secret-dental-enamel- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd92cb72-2708-4920-bc5d-8a99403233e1 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:54:26 -0400 Stem cells used to create organoids that secrete dental enamel proteins
深部脑刺激显示出中风后康复的希望克利夫兰诊所研究人员对中风后康复患者进行的首次深部脑刺激 (DBS) 人体试验表明，使用 DBS 来瞄准齿状核——调节随意运动、认知、语言和感觉的精细控制大脑的功能——安全且可行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Deep-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-post-中风-rehabilitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Deep-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-post-中风-rehabilitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3f5f2e0-9801-4504-b43c-d8e5eed29d18 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:42:22 -0400 Deep brain stimulation shows promise for post-stroke rehabilitation
野火、农业和农业排放可能对认知健康构成有毒威胁密歇根大学的最新研究表明，再多的空气污染对大脑都没有好处，但野火和农业产生的排放物尤其可能对认知健康造成特别有毒的威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Wildfires-emissions-from-agriculture-and-farming-may-pose-有毒-threats-to-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Wildfires-emissions-from-agriculture-and-farming-may-pose-known-threats-to-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8946c8c5-a7b9-4bad-81b9-d3d3bf403d04 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:38:33 -0400 Wildfires, emissions from agriculture and farming may pose toxic threats to cognitive health
研究发现前列腺癌致命肿瘤转换的新机制密歇根大学罗格尔癌症中心的一项研究发现了一种新机制，可以解释为什么一些前列腺肿瘤从常见的、可治疗的形式转变为更罕见和更具侵袭性的前列腺癌形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-discovers-new-mechanism-for-deadly-tumor-switch-in-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-discovers-new-mechanism-for-deadly-tumor-switch-in-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94ef59d1-404b-420b-9b5f-76bfd2b321c0 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:27:49 -0400 Study discovers new mechanism for deadly tumor switch in prostate cancer
综合心理保健可改善儿童的心理健康和学校表现波士顿医学中心和波士顿大学公共卫生学院领导的新研究发现，接受综合心理健康护理的儿童的心理健康和学校表现均有所改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Integrated-mental-health-care-improves-childrens-mental-health-and-school-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Integrated-mental-health-care-improves-childrens-mental-health-and-school-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f2943a9-9a7e-4ada-ab32-ee4982102720 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:10:40 -0400 Integrated mental health care improves children's mental health and school performance
强化生活方式干预可增加 2 型糖尿病患者的就业机会南加州大学谢弗中心和明尼苏达大学的研究人员发现，没有大学学位的研究参与者通过专家建议的生活方式改变获得了更大的就业收益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Intective-lifestyle-intervention-linked-to-increased-employment-for-people-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Intective-lifestyle-intervention-linked-to-increased-employment-for-people-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=346d2416-ceae-43a8-be55-9336ee85a356 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 15:04:30 -0400 Intensive lifestyle intervention linked to increased employment for people with type 2 diabetes
新的诊断工具可能会彻底改变早期膀胱癌的检测如果早期发现，膀胱癌的五年生存率超过 80%，但随着疾病进展到晚期，这一比率会显着下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/New-diagnostic-tool-could-revolutionize-early-bladder-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/New-diagnostic-tool-could-revolutionize-early-bladder-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a535416b-10f3-4925-8ad1-c66ea3aaf7fe Mon, 14 Aug 2023 14:48:09 -0400 New diagnostic tool could revolutionize early bladder cancer detection
科学家发现心血管调节的新分子靶点希望之城是美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，也是糖尿病和其他危及生命的疾病的领先研究中心，其科学家们发现了细胞受体上的新分子靶点，这些靶点在心血管调节中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Scientists-uncover-new-molecular-targets-for-cardioangio-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Scientists-uncover-new-molecular-targets-for-cardioangio-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d415921f-e26d-4854-86a4-66ea16f15bc5 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 14:23:00 -0400 Scientists uncover new molecular targets for cardiovascular regulation
研究为围绕创新外科手术的沟通过程提供了重要见解由布里斯托大学领导并发表在《外科年鉴》上的研究发现，在决定继续进行手术时，患者没有获得有关手术新状态、可能的不确定性或潜在风险的足够信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-provides-key-insights-into-the-communication-process-surrounding-innovative-surgical-procedures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-provides-key-insights-into-the-communication-process-surrounding-innovative-surgical-procedures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5565b18b-85b7-4ea2-88a2-e0b976921996 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 13:46:44 -0400
